meanings.definition: Resembling a rose in appearance or fragrance.
meanings.sent1: The roselike scent of the perfume filled the room.
meanings.sent2: Her roselike cheeks blushed when she received a compliment.
meanings.sent3: The roselike soap made everyone smell like flowers.
meanings.sent4: The roselike sunset painted the sky in shades of pink and orange.
meanings.sent5: The roselike petals of the flower were soft to the touch.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to a rose.
meanings.sent1: The fabric had a roselike softness that was comforting to wear.
meanings.sent2: His roselike personality made him popular among his peers.
meanings.sent3: The roselike cupcakes were a hit at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was roselike, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The roselike beauty of the garden attracted many visitors.
